that although on average the performance of the model is impressive, the spread is large. The
standard deviation is a little more than 134 sales, meaning a worse case model run that is 2
or 3 standard deviations in error from the mean error may be worse than the naive model. A
challenge in using the MLP model is in harnessing the higher skill and minimizing the variance
of the model across multiple runs.
This problem applies generally for neural networks. There are many strategies that you
